title: KHPT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Nurse and Counsellor Posts
description: Karnataka Health Promotion Trust (KHPT) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Nurse and Counsellor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc Nursing, GNM, can grab this chance and apply for the KHPT Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online before the last date of application....
